show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

header.title: USA: The Greatest Threat To The Human Race Of All Time

title: USA: The Greatest Threat To The Human Race Of All Time
content:
An in-depth analysis of U.S. military bases around the world and the futility and redundancy of having them. <!--more--> Everywhere they exist they cause resentment and loathing.
They are clearly a precursor to a major conflagration.
Listen to a sobering account of what this all means.
The horrors of NAFTA and its effect on Mexico.
Bill Still talks about the UK governmentâ€™s forthcoming parliamentary debate on how money is created.
The fate of local government finances: a disaster waiting to happen.
